dt2.12:1.3: saṅkhārakkhandhena ye dhammā sampayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.12:1.4: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:1.6: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:2.6: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:2.8: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:3.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:3.5: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:4.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:4.4: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:5.5: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:5.7: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:6.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:6.4: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:7.11: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:7.13: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.12:11.6: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.12:12.6: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.12:13.6: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.12:14.4: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:15.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:15.4: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:16.5: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:16.6: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:16.8: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.12:17.6: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:18.3: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:18.5: Dvīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:19.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:19.4: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:20.2: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:20.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:21.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:21.2: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:21.3: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:21.9: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:21.11: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:22.2: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:22.3: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:22.4: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:22.6: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:23.1: Sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:23.2: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:23.3: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:23.4: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:23.6: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:24.2: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:24.3: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:24.4: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:24.6: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:25.1: Āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:25.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:25.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:26.7: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:26.8: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:26.10: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:27.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:27.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:28.2: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:28.4: Dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:29.7: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:29.9: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:30.3: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:30.4: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:30.5: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā …
dt2.12:30.6: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:30.8: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.12:31.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:31.2: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.12:31.8: upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.12:31.9: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.12:31.11: Catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
